name: GridFilterApi
description: The filter API interface that is available in the grid apiRef.

properties.name: getFilterState
properties.description: Returns the filter state for the given filter model without applying it to the Data Grid.

properties.name: ignoreDiacritics
properties.description: Returns the value of the ignoreDiacritics prop.

properties.name: setFilterLogicOperator
properties.description: Changes the GridLogicOperator used to connect the filters.

properties.name: setFilterModel
properties.description: Sets the filter model to the one given by model.

properties.name: setQuickFilterValues
properties.description: Set the quick filter values to the one given by values

properties.name: showFilterPanel
properties.description: Shows the filter panel. If targetColumnField is given, a filter for this field is also added.
properties.type: (targetColumnField?: string, panelId?: string, labelId?: string) => void
